name: K.S. San Diego, US
message: There are many online Jyotish astrologers on the Net, but I have not strayed from Astrofolk. The birth chart rectification that the company did for me was life changing! Thanks!.

name: John, Canada
message: You do a very good job! Congratulations and thank you!!

name: Bala Ji
message: It is indeed a great site.

name: Durga Prasad
message: Excellent experience! Thank you very much for your contribution to the society. You are doing a great job.

name: Omar, Doha
message: Thank you!! This is a great site keep doing the good work!

name: Svetlana, Russia
message: I prefer to use Indian astrology, because it is much more highly evolved than Western, over its 6,000 year history. The astrologers are precise, accurate and very prompt at generating reports. The customer can be confident in their expertise, and their focus. Thanks
